command.name: create

help.short: Name of the management IP configuration.
Name or ID of the public IP to use for management IP configuration.

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.applicationRuleCollections" options="application-rule-collections" hide="True" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.applicationRuleCollections[].properties.rules" options="rules" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.applicationRuleCollections[].properties.rules[].fqdnTags" options="fqdn-tags">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.applicationRuleCollections[].properties.rules[].protocols" options="protocols">

<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.applicationRuleCollections[].properties.rules[].sourceIpGroups" options="source-ip-groups">

help.short: Number of Public IP Address associated with azure firewall. It's used to add public ip addresses into this firewall.
